data.sentence: The word وَحَدَائِقَ comes from the root ح د ق and is associated with the meanings: To surround, encompass, look at.

data.meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force
data.sentence: The word غُلْبًا comes from the root غ ل ب and is associated with the meanings: overcame, conquered, subdued, mastered, surpassed, superior in power or force
